about_the_game:
A Solo Horror Card Game Set in the 1950s: Abducted and isolated in a mysterious, eerie setting, you must use your wits to escape and survive. Crafted by shadowy figures with unknown motives, this card game plunges you into a chilling adventure filled with suspense and peril in a bygone era.



In Snatched You Will...

  • Get Abducted by the Snatchers - (Story Mode)
  • Acquire a deck of WW1 and WW2 Based Cards at the start of each Russian Rootlet Based Round
  • Fight for your life against another Victim by playing a game of Snatched
  • Set off on a journey that is as profoundly unsettling as it is unexpected in our game
  • A Group of Masked men will deliver you to a hidden abandoned destination where you're forced against your will at gun point to play Snatched (A Game of Cards)



Gameplay and Features
  • Story Mode will be available later at EA release, allowing you to experience a brief narrative on how you were initially abducted.
  • Early Access release will feature the core game, "Snatched," a card game driven by RNG where you compete for your life in a shower room, facing another victim at gunpoint, with the same amount of luck.
  • Matches can go either way, you either lose and get shot or you win and play to live another day
  • Each Map where you play cards (you've been abducted already) will feature a certain atmosphere, the first one releasing at EA release is called "Shower Room" This is where you will be forced to play the card game known as Snatched in this Universe.

content_descriptors.notes: [i]This game contains mature themes and graphic content that some players might find disturbing. Players are thrust into a high-stakes scenario where their character is abducted and forced to participate in a card game at gunpoint. The game setting includes graphic scenes of violence and blood, with visible remnants of previous players who did not survive. There are no depictions of sexual acts, sexual assault, or drug and alcohol abuse; however, the intense theme of coercion and life-threatening situations may be sensitive for some audiences. This content is integral to the game's storyline and atmosphere.[/i]

name: Snatched

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Quad-core Intel or AMD processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game includes graphics settings to aid lower end devices.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Intel Core i5-11400F or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1080 GTX or AMD Radeon 5700XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game includes graphics settings to aid lower end devices.

reviews:
“Snatched' (in ea) is an interesting card-based strategy game with a dark atmosphere..enter the battlefield and use different soldier classes, tank,balance supply..more content and story mode to come”
Gaming Grandma

“Bla Bla Bla...”
BlaBlaReviewss
short_description: Snatched plunges players into a high-stakes world where they are abducted and forced to compete in deadly card games. Set in a grim, blood-stained room, each round is a fight for survival against other captives, with the ever-present threat of violence looming.
